His 'secondary sanctions' warning</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst deepening India-Russia oil ties, President Trump has escalated sanctions against New Delhi by imposing an additional 25% tariff, bringing the total to 50%. India's external affairs ministry swiftly condemned the increase as unfair and unreasonable, emphasizing that its oil imports are driven by energy security needs. These incidents follow a series of recent assaults targeting Indians in Ireland, raising concerns about racism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/6-year-old-pio-girl-and-indian-chef-latest-to-be-attacked-in-ireland/articleshow/123149221.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/europe/6-year-old-pio-girl-and-indian-chef-latest-to-be-attacked-in-ireland/articleshow/123149221.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 00:09:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NAOMI CANTON</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1010461" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123149378,imgsize-1010461.cms"/></item><item><title>Rajasthan horror: Over 25 dogs slaughtered as men on motorbikes shoot at strays in Jhunjhunu</title><description><![CDATA[A shocking incident in Jhunjhunu's Kumawas village has ignited fury among animal activists after a video surfaced showing two men shooting and killing over 25 dogs. The gruesome act, which occurred on August 2nd and 3rd, prompted police action after the video circulated on social media.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/man-guns-down-25-dogs-animal-activists-outraged/articleshow/123150359.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/man-guns-down-25-dogs-animal-activists-outraged/articleshow/123150359.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 01:10:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4721624" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154621,imgsize-4721624.cms"/></item><item><title>Cloudburst: Local festival spares lives as half of residents travel across stream</title><description><![CDATA[A flash flood in Dharali devastated one side of the village, but many residents were spared due to their participation in the Hardoodh festival on the opposite bank. This annual ritual, dedicated to Naag Devta, drew them away from the vulnerable side of the stream, where unscientific construction had taken place.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-local-festival-spares-lives-as-half-of-residents-travel-across-stream-villagers-say-loss-could-have-been-far-greater-guardian-deity-saved-us/articleshow/123153898.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/dehradun/uttarakhand-cloudburst-local-festival-spares-lives-as-half-of-residents-travel-across-stream-villagers-say-loss-could-have-been-far-greater-guardian-deity-saved-us/articleshow/123153898.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:17:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SHIVANI AZAD</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="73674" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123153901,imgsize-73674.cms"/></item><item><title>Cyber attack? United Airlines grounds hundreds of flights at US airports</title><description><![CDATA[United Airlines faced widespread disruptions Wednesday evening after a technology issue temporarily grounded all mainline flights. Hundreds of flights were delayed, and some were canceled, impacting passengers across the U.S. Key hubs like Newark, San Francisco, and Denver experienced ground stops. The airline confirmed the issue was not a cyberattack and that United Express flights were unaffected.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/cyber-attack-united-airlines-grounds-flights-at-us-airports-hundreds-of-flights-affected/articleshow/123154048.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/cyber-attack-united-airlines-grounds-flights-at-us-airports-hundreds-of-flights-affected/articleshow/123154048.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:39:27 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1137201" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154073,imgsize-1137201.cms"/></item><item><title>Deleting my Instagram today, writes tech startup CEO; Elon Musk responds</title><description><![CDATA[A tech startup CEO's decision to delete his Instagram account, declaring it's "time to be a man," has sparked widespread discussion. Elon Musk endorsed the move, echoing his criticism of Meta's platforms for superficial engagement and privacy concerns.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/social/deleting-my-instagram-today-not-just-the-app-the-whole-account-writes-tech-startup-ceo-elon-musk-responds-this-is-/articleshow/123138763.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/social/deleting-my-instagram-today-not-just-the-app-the-whole-account-writes-tech-startup-ceo-elon-musk-responds-this-is-/articleshow/123138763.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 14:21:29 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20908" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123138734,imgsize-20908.cms"/></item><item><title>Dharali flash flood: 360 million cubic metres of glacial debris came tumbling down, experts estimate</title><description><![CDATA[A devastating flash flood in Dharali village was triggered by a massive collapse of glacial sedimentary deposits, not just heavy rain. Experts estimate an avalanche of 360 million cubic meters of debris flattened structures and claimed lives. The unstable glacial deposit, combined with steep terrain, accelerated the debris flow, leaving residents with no chance of escape.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/360-million-cubic-metres-of-glacial-debris-came-tumbling-down-experts-estimate/articleshow/123152178.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/360-million-cubic-metres-of-glacial-debris-came-tumbling-down-experts-estimate/articleshow/123152178.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 05:11:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV TALWAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1505988" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123152207,imgsize-1505988.cms"/></item><item><title>'Held back when team needed more': Ex-India pacer questions Bumrah’s impact in England</title><description><![CDATA[Irfan Pathan has critiqued Jasprit Bumrah's performance in the recent Test series against England, despite Bumrah being one of the top wicket-takers. Pathan believes Bumrah didn't display enough killer instinct in crucial moments, particularly when defending totals or needing breakthroughs. He highlighted instances where Bumrah could have bowled longer spells or varied his approach to create more pressure on the opposition.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-held-back-when-india-needed-more-former-india-pacer-questions-jasprit-bumrahs-impact-in-drawn-england-series/articleshow/123153179.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-held-back-when-india-needed-more-former-india-pacer-questions-jasprit-bumrahs-impact-in-drawn-england-series/articleshow/123153179.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 06:32:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="87096" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123153196,imgsize-87096.cms"/></item><item><title>Finland-based thinktank exposes US double standard</title><description><![CDATA[Data reveals the EU's significant role in Russia's fossil fuel revenues, surpassing India's contribution since the Ukraine conflict began. Despite Western sanctions, G7+ tankers transport over half of Russia's oil, highlighting a disconnect between policy and practice. While Russia's fossil fuel revenues have decreased, exports have increased, with India emphasizing its role in stabilizing global oil prices.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/finland-based-thinktank-exposes-us-double-standard/articleshow/123151870.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/finland-based-thinktank-exposes-us-double-standard/articleshow/123151870.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:47:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY DUTTA AND SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1096571" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154332,imgsize-1096571.cms"/></item><item><title>'100% crap,' says Ex-Google exec on idea that AI will create new jobs</title><description><![CDATA[Mo Gawdat, former Google X chief, predicts AI will displace even top executives, challenging optimistic views of AI as a job creator. He argues that AI's capabilities, demonstrated by his own startup, threaten white-collar jobs and C-suite positions. While some advocate for upskilling, Gawdat criticizes the profit-driven AI deployment, urging ethical considerations and potential universal basic income solutions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/100-crap-says-ex-google-exec-on-the-idea-that-ai-will-create-new-jobs-has-a-warning-there-will-be-a-time/articleshow/123146526.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/100-crap-says-ex-google-exec-on-the-idea-that-ai-will-create-new-jobs-has-a-warning-there-will-be-a-time/articleshow/123146526.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 22:05:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20472" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123146514,imgsize-20472.cms"/></item><item><title>Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for August 7 - check list</title><description><![CDATA[Top stock market recommendations: Nuvama Professional Clients Group's Aakash K Hindocha suggests a cautious outlook on Nifty and Bank Nifty, anticipating potential sharp moves. He recommends buying Asian Paints, Cummins India, and Eicher Motors.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-07-2025-asian-paints-cummins-india-eicher-motors-best-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/123154169.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/top-stock-recommendations-for-august-07-2025-asian-paints-cummins-india-eicher-motors-best-stocks-to-buy-today/articleshow/123154169.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:52:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="56900" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154209,imgsize-56900.cms"/></item><item><title>'Genuinely worried': Woakes reveals Gill’s comment after gutsy effort</title><description><![CDATA[England's Chris Woakes, battling a shoulder injury sustained on Day 1, displayed remarkable courage during the fifth Test against India. Shubman Gill praised Woakes' bravery after the match.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/genuinely-worried-chris-woakes-reveals-shubman-gills-comment-after-gutsy-effort-with-injured-shoulder-calls-draw-a-fair-result/articleshow/123153695.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/genuinely-worried-chris-woakes-reveals-shubman-gills-comment-after-gutsy-effort-with-injured-shoulder-calls-draw-a-fair-result/articleshow/123153695.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:09:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="99020" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123153725,imgsize-99020.cms"/></item><item><title>IND vs ENG: Chris Woakes - 'You lose a player, you find a way'</title><description><![CDATA[Chris Woakes supports Ben Stokes' opposition to injury substitutions in Test cricket, citing potential loopholes despite understanding the appeal for freak injuries like his fractured shoulder. Woakes believes losing a player forces resilience and strengthens the team. He reflects on the public support following his decision to bat through the pain in the final Test.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-chris-woakes-on-injury-replacements-in-tests-you-lose-a-player-you-find-a-way/articleshow/123154311.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-chris-woakes-on-injury-replacements-in-tests-you-lose-a-player-you-find-a-way/articleshow/123154311.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 08:03:13 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="131238" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154315,imgsize-131238.cms"/></item><item><title>Angry at Mira Murati for refusing Meta's Job Offer; Zuckerberg launched a full-scale …</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, reportedly attempted to acquire Mira Murati's startup, Thinking Machines Lab, with a $1 billion offer. After Murati declined, Zuckerberg allegedly launched a recruitment drive targeting its employees, including Andrew Tulloch, offering a potential $1.5 billion pay package.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/angry-at-mira-murati-for-refusing-metas-1-billion-job-offer-ceo-mark-zuckerberg-launched-a-full-scale-/articleshow/123121189.cms</guid><pubDate>Tue, 05 Aug 2025 19:30:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="44662" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123121185,imgsize-44662.cms"/></item><item><title>'It's definitely a blow': Shashi Tharoor reacts to Trump's 50% tariff on India</title><description><![CDATA[Shashi Tharoor has criticised the US imposition of a 25% tariff on India's crude oil imports from Russia, bringing the total tariff on Indian goods to 50%. He warned that this will make Indian products less competitive in the US market compared to countries with lower tariffs. The ministry of external affairs also expressed its disapproval of the US decision.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/its-definitely-a-blow-shashi-tharoor-reacts-to-trumps-50-tariff-on-india-asserts-its-not-a-good-news/articleshow/123154096.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/its-definitely-a-blow-shashi-tharoor-reacts-to-trumps-50-tariff-on-india-asserts-its-not-a-good-news/articleshow/123154096.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:46:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1185870" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154065,imgsize-1185870.cms"/></item><item><title>PM Modi may visit China for the 1st time in 7 years; visit amid trade standoff with US</title><description><![CDATA[PM Narendra Modi is likely to visit China for the Shanghai Cooperation Summit in late August, hosted by President Xi Jinping. Preparations are underway for India's participation, with a potential bilateral meeting between Modi and Xi on the agenda.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-may-visit-china-for-the-1st-time-in-7-years-visit-amid-trade-standoff-with-us/articleshow/123148637.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/pm-may-visit-china-for-the-1st-time-in-7-years-visit-amid-trade-standoff-with-us/articleshow/123148637.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 23:33:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SACHIN PARASHAR</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="596055" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123148604,imgsize-596055.cms"/></item><item><title>'Like Ashwin, Kuldeep must ...': Ex-player explains India's selection call in England</title><description><![CDATA[Robin Uthappa offered his perspective on Kuldeep Yadav's exclusion from the Test series against England, emphasizing team balance over pure bowling skill. He contrasted Kuldeep with Ravichandran Ashwin, highlighting Ashwin's batting prowess. Uthappa also lauded Yashasvi Jaiswal's dedication and Shubman Gill's evolving leadership, noting Gill's tactical growth during the series.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-like-ashwin-kuldeep-yadav-must-robin-uthappa-explains-indias-selection-call-in-england-tests/articleshow/123154052.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-like-ashwin-kuldeep-yadav-must-robin-uthappa-explains-indias-selection-call-in-england-tests/articleshow/123154052.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 07:37:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34546" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123154070,imgsize-34546.cms"/></item><item><title>Hulk Hogan snub claim: Brooke’s husband speaks out; says wrestling icon ignored grandkids</title><description><![CDATA[Hulk Hogan's relationship with his daughter Brooke was strained before his death, with her husband, Steven Oleksy, revealing Hogan showed no interest in meeting his newborn twins, despite Brooke's efforts to reconnect. The couple had moved to Florida to support Hogan, but he remained distant, leaving Brooke heartbroken by unanswered attempts to reconcile.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/brooke-hogans-husband-says-hulk-hogan-made-no-effort-to-meet-his-grandkids-before-his-demise-there-was-no-interest/articleshow/123054607.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/wwe/top-stories/brooke-hogans-husband-says-hulk-hogan-made-no-effort-to-meet-his-grandkids-before-his-demise-there-was-no-interest/articleshow/123054607.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:37:47 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="114976" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054627,imgsize-114976.cms"/></item><item><title>'Ask me that when I retire': Travis bluntly shuts down retirement talk; fans react to his confidence</title><description><![CDATA[Kansas City Chiefs' tight end Travis Kelce, 35, dismisses retirement talks despite entering his 13th NFL season. Kelce's sharp response to retirement questions during training camp indicates his focus remains on football. Coach Andy Reid affirms Kelce's importance to the team, while teammate Patrick Mahomes highlights Kelce's improved physique and dedication.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-blunt-retirement-answer-at-36-sparks-fan-reaction/articleshow/123150697.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/travis-kelces-blunt-retirement-answer-at-36-sparks-fan-reaction/articleshow/123150697.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:29:42 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="22748" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150690,imgsize-22748.cms"/></item><item><title>Dwyane Wade’s scandal recall: Ex-wife's STD claim; 'The gossip went global,' NBA star says</title><description><![CDATA[Dwyane Wade's past divorce from Siohvaughn Funches resurfaced due to accusations of transmitting an STD, which he vehemently denied. Wade detailed the ordeal in his book, highlighting the defamation suit he filed and the subsequent withdrawal of claims. Despite the controversy and public scrutiny, Wade moved on, finding love with Gabrielle Union.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/the-gossip-went-global-dwyane-wade-once-recalled-std-accusations-from-ex-wife-siohvaughn-funches-and-how-it-changed-his-life/articleshow/123150573.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/the-gossip-went-global-dwyane-wade-once-recalled-std-accusations-from-ex-wife-siohvaughn-funches-and-how-it-changed-his-life/articleshow/123150573.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 01:38:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="884461" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150586,imgsize-884461.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump tariffs: Exporters on edge, fear losing orders</title><description><![CDATA[Indian businesses anticipate significant order losses during the festival season due to Donald Trump's 50% tariffs on exports to the US, making competition with other countries difficult. Exporters are hoping for a breakthrough in trade negotiations, but many orders are already on hold as buyers reassess sourcing. Diversification is challenging as China increases its focus on European and other markets.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-tariffs-exporters-on-edge-fear-losing-orders/articleshow/123149915.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/trump-tariffs-exporters-on-edge-fear-losing-orders/articleshow/123149915.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 00:42:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SIDHARTHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1081459" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150011,imgsize-1081459.cms"/></item><item><title>'Saiyaara' collection: Ahaan Panday’s starrer dips to Rs 2cr; holds strong against 'SOS 2' </title><description><![CDATA[Mohit Suri's 'Saiyaara,' starring Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, has become a surprise romantic blockbuster, earning over Rs 300 crore in India. While its collections are now slowing down after a stellar run, the film has crossed Rs 500 crore worldwide and is the second highest-grossing Bollywood film in North America this year. 'Saiyaara' faces competition from 'War 2' soon.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-20-ahaan-panday-aneet-paddas-romantic-drama-dips-to-rs-2-crore-on-third-wednesday-still-holds-strong-against-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2/articleshow/123152713.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/hindi/bollywood/box-office/saiyaara-box-office-collection-day-20-ahaan-panday-aneet-paddas-romantic-drama-dips-to-rs-2-crore-on-third-wednesday-still-holds-strong-against-son-of-sardaar-2-and-dhadak-2/articleshow/123152713.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 05:54:15 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI ENTERTAINMENT DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="27822" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123152712,imgsize-27822.cms"/></item><item><title>India should capture world's mindspace: PM</title><description><![CDATA[PM Modi emphasized the need for India to attract global consumers, tourists, and students, urging citizens to enhance productivity. He highlighted the government's focus on infrastructure development and transparent governance, noting that over Rs 4.3 lakh crore has been saved by eliminating fraudulent beneficiaries through Jan Dhan, Aadhaar, and Mobile integration. Redevelopment of government offices will further save public expenditure.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-should-capture-worlds-mindspace-pm/articleshow/123151972.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/india-should-capture-worlds-mindspace-pm/articleshow/123151972.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:53:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DIPAK K DASH</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19796" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123152019,imgsize-19796.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Very soon’: Trump to meet Putin for first time in term two; to push end to Russia-Ukraine war</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump indicated a potential meeting with Vladimir Putin to discuss the Russia-Ukraine war, following White House confirmation of openness to such talks. This comes after a US envoy's discussions in Moscow with Putin, and a call between Trump, Zelensky, and NATO leaders. Trump has given Russia until Friday to show progress toward peace or face new sanctions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/very-soon-trump-to-meet-putin-for-first-time-in-term-two-to-push-end-to-russia-ukraine-war/articleshow/123151154.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/very-soon-trump-to-meet-putin-for-first-time-in-term-two-to-push-end-to-russia-ukraine-war/articleshow/123151154.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 03:47:04 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1222092" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123151188,imgsize-1222092.cms"/></item><item><title>India's dignity belittled by hand-pulled rickshaws: SC</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court has voiced strong disapproval of the continued use of hand-pulled rickshaws in Matheran, calling it an affront to India's progress and constitutional values. The court directed the Maharashtra government to create a scheme within six months to replace these with e-rickshaws, drawing inspiration from a successful model empowering tribal women in Gujarat.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-dignity-belittled-by-hand-pulled-rickshaws-sc/articleshow/123150719.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/indias-dignity-belittled-by-hand-pulled-rickshaws-sc/articleshow/123150719.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:45:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="114628" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150734,imgsize-114628.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump slams Taylor Swift: Calls her ‘no longer hot’; Travis stays silent but show support</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump's comment on Taylor Swift created social media buzz. Fans looked to Travis Kelce for a response. Kelce chose not to publicly react. Sources say Kelce supports Swift privately. Swift plans to attend Kelce's NFL games. The situation blends celebrity, politics, and sports. Kelce's loyalty remains constant. His actions show love and leadership.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/after-donald-trumps-no-longer-hot-swipe-at-taylor-swift-travis-kelce-chooses-loyalty-over-controversy-with-silent-show-of-support/articleshow/123146528.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nfl/news/after-donald-trumps-no-longer-hot-swipe-at-taylor-swift-travis-kelce-chooses-loyalty-over-controversy-with-silent-show-of-support/articleshow/123146528.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 05:19:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="63388" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123147304,imgsize-63388.cms"/></item><item><title>Opposition: Government evading SIR debate; 'has lot to hide'</title><description><![CDATA[The INDIA bloc is set to march to the Election Commission on August 11, protesting alleged manipulation of votes, particularly concerning the revision of Bihar's electoral rolls. Opposition leaders accuse the Modi government of concealing information by refusing to discuss the matter in Parliament, leading to disruptions during the Monsoon session.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/opposition-government-evading-sir-debate-has-lot-to-hide/articleshow/123150663.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/opposition-government-evading-sir-debate-has-lot-to-hide/articleshow/123150663.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:14:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SUBODH GHILDIYAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1746564" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150664,imgsize-1746564.cms"/></item><item><title>ED questions two close associates of Anil Ambani</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-questions-two-close-associates-of-anil-ambani/articleshow/123151662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ed-questions-two-close-associates-of-anil-ambani/articleshow/123151662.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:30:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="622471" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123151698,imgsize-622471.cms"/></item><item><title>Asim Munir’s grip on power deepens Pakistan’s militarisation</title><description><![CDATA[Field Marshal Syed Asim Munir's rise in Pakistan, following a military standoff with India, signals a shift towards greater military influence. Despite denials, speculation persists about his expanding role in civilian affairs. Amidst economic challenges and internal strife, Munir's hardline stance towards India and crackdown on dissent, including Imran Khan's imprisonment, raise concerns about the nation's trajectory.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/asim-munirs-grip-on-power-deepens-pakistans-militarisation/articleshow/123149069.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/pakistan/asim-munirs-grip-on-power-deepens-pakistans-militarisation/articleshow/123149069.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 23:57:08 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>OMER FAROOQ KHAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1482633" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123149074,imgsize-1482633.cms"/></item><item><title>EC to opposition: Get 'wrongfully excluded' to file claims</title><description><![CDATA[The Election Commission (EC) refuted allegations from opposition MPs Asaduddin Owaisi and Randeep Surjewala regarding the Bihar electoral roll revision, urging them to facilitate claim filings for allegedly excluded voters. The EC highlighted the low number of claims filed by party booth level agents despite reported irregularities. The revision aims to improve electoral processes, including limiting voters per booth.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-to-opposition-get-wrongfully-excluded-to-file-claims/articleshow/123150668.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ec-to-opposition-get-wrongfully-excluded-to-file-claims/articleshow/123150668.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:18:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1127382" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150675,imgsize-1127382.cms"/></item><item><title>Your trust is valued, journey safeguarded, AI CEO tells flyers</title><description><![CDATA[Following the Flight AI 171 crash in Ahmedabad, Air India is launching a campaign to rebuild passenger confidence. MD and CEO Campbell Wilson assures customers of their safety through rigorous processes and advanced technology. The airline is gradually restoring international services, aiming for full resumption by October 1, while implementing detailed inspections and strengthened safety systems.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/your-trust-is-valued-journey-safeguarded-ai-ceo-tells-flyers/articleshow/123151746.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/your-trust-is-valued-journey-safeguarded-ai-ceo-tells-flyers/articleshow/123151746.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:37:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="55086" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123151759,imgsize-55086.cms"/></item><item><title>SC allows use of Stalin's name in TN schemes, says other govts do it too</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court addressed the widespread practice of naming welfare schemes after politicians, both at the state and central levels. It overturned a Madras High Court order against Tamil Nadu's 'Ungaludan Stalin' scheme and penalized AIADMK MP C Ve Shanmugam with ₹10 lakh for singling out the TN scheme while similar schemes exist elsewhere.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-allows-use-of-stalins-name-in-tn-schemes-says-other-govts-do-it-too/articleshow/123151278.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-allows-use-of-stalins-name-in-tn-schemes-says-other-govts-do-it-too/articleshow/123151278.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 03:54:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1701173" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123151296,imgsize-1701173.cms"/></item><item><title>Terror funding: Special NIA court frames charges against Jamaat-e-Islami trio, trust</title><description><![CDATA[A special NIA court in Jammu has charged three Jamaat-e-Islami operatives and a trust for allegedly raising and using funds to promote the banned organization's activities, violating the UAPA. The accused include Amir Mohammad Shamsi, Abdul Hamid Ganai, and Pakistan-based Mushtaq Ahmad Mir, along with the Al-Huda Educational Trust. Evidence includes witness statements, financial records, and money transfers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/terror-funding-special-nia-court-frames-charges-against-jamaat-e-islami-trio-trust/articleshow/123149700.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/terror-funding-special-nia-court-frames-charges-against-jamaat-e-islami-trio-trust/articleshow/123149700.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 00:24:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SANJAY KHAJURIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="933736" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123149698,imgsize-933736.cms"/></item><item><title>SC judges take exception to order against HC judge</title><description><![CDATA[Supreme Court judges are expressing serious concerns over a recent order by Justices Pardiwala and Mahadevan, which criticized an Allahabad High Court judge and removed him from criminal cases. This action is seen as a breach of established SC rulings that designate the High Court Chief Justice as the sole authority for case allocation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-judges-take-exception-to-order-against-hc-judge/articleshow/123151364.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/sc-judges-take-exception-to-order-against-hc-judge/articleshow/123151364.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 04:03:01 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1026955" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123151387,imgsize-1026955.cms"/></item><item><title>Calcutta HC commutes death sentence, says justice must not be 'bloodthirsty'</title><description><![CDATA[Calcutta High Court's Jalpaiguri circuit bench commuted Aftab Alam's death sentence to life imprisonment without parole for 20 years in his uncle's murder case. The court emphasized reform over revenge, stating the trial court relied more on emotion than facts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/calcutta-hc-commutes-death-sentence-says-justice-must-not-be-bloodthirsty/articleshow/123150739.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/calcutta-hc-commutes-death-sentence-says-justice-must-not-be-bloodthirsty/articleshow/123150739.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:53:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SRISHTI LAKHOTIA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="32976" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150741,imgsize-32976.cms"/></item><item><title>Doubtful conduct of an accused not enough for conviction: SC</title><description><![CDATA[The Supreme Court overturned a murder conviction. The court stated that an accused's suspicious behavior isn't enough for a guilty verdict. There must be more evidence. The judges set aside earlier rulings. They emphasized conduct is just one factor. It needs strong support. An FIR admitting guilt is not fully admissible.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/doubtful-conduct-of-an-accused-not-enough-for-conviction-sc/articleshow/123150746.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/doubtful-conduct-of-an-accused-not-enough-for-conviction-sc/articleshow/123150746.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:58:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AMIT ANAND CHOUDHARY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1707936" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150751,imgsize-1707936.cms"/></item><item><title>Omar writes to all political parties for J&K’s statehood, calls it ‘essential course correction’</title><description><![CDATA[Jammu and Kashmir's Chief Minister, Omar Abdullah, has appealed to national parties, including the BJP, to reinstate statehood for J&K, emphasizing it as a constitutional right, not a discretionary favor. He argues that downgrading a state to a Union Territory sets a dangerous precedent, urging a bill in Parliament's current session.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/omar-writes-to-all-political-parties-for-jks-statehood-calls-it-essential-course-correction/articleshow/123149599.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/omar-writes-to-all-political-parties-for-jks-statehood-calls-it-essential-course-correction/articleshow/123149599.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 00:19:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>NASEER GANAI</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1207059" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123149564,imgsize-1207059.cms"/></item><item><title>In a 1st: Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha pass two bills of same ministry on same day</title><description><![CDATA[In a rare occurrence, both Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha passed two shipping bills on the same day amidst opposition protests. The Merchant Shipping Bill, 2025, aims to modernize maritime governance and promote India's role in global trade.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-a-1st-lok-sabha-rajya-sabha-pass-two-bills-of-same-ministry-on-same-day/articleshow/123150678.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/in-a-1st-lok-sabha-rajya-sabha-pass-two-bills-of-same-ministry-on-same-day/articleshow/123150678.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 02:22:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1508420" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150680,imgsize-1508420.cms"/></item><item><title>Maple Leafs' playoff gamble: Nick Robertson stays; Auston Matthews eyes deeper NHL run</title><description><![CDATA[In a strategic offseason decision, the Toronto Maple Leafs have decided to retain forward Nick Robertson despite ongoing NHL trade rumors. With Auston Matthews leading the franchise's charge toward Stanley Cup contention, the team is focusing on long-term potential. Robertson's youth and offensive upside give him an edge over trade candidates like David Kampf and Calle Jarnkrok.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/nhl-drama-heats-up-toronto-maple-leafs-keep-nick-robertson-as-auston-matthews-eyes-a-deeper-playoff-run/articleshow/123147285.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/nhl-drama-heats-up-toronto-maple-leafs-keep-nick-robertson-as-auston-matthews-eyes-a-deeper-playoff-run/articleshow/123147285.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 23:21:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="10346" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123147374,imgsize-10346.cms"/></item><item><title>RBI keeps rates on hold, cuts inflation estimate for FY26</title><description><![CDATA[The Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) has decided to keep the repo rate unchanged at 5.5%, maintaining a neutral stance. While retaining the FY26 growth forecast at 6.5%, the MPC lowered the inflation projection to 3.1%. This decision considers macroeconomic conditions, the need for further transmission of rate cuts, and favorable monsoon conditions, despite lingering global trade challenges and geopolitical uncertainties.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/rbi-keeps-rates-on-hold-cuts-inflation-estimate-for-fy26/articleshow/123150060.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/rbi-keeps-rates-on-hold-cuts-inflation-estimate-for-fy26/articleshow/123150060.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 07 Aug 2025 00:50:21 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1793999" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123150083,imgsize-1793999.cms"/></item><item><title>Mohammed Siraj's classy reply to Owaisi's viral 'poora khol' comment</title><description><![CDATA[India defeated England by six runs in the final Test, leveling the series. Mohammed Siraj took five wickets, earning praise from Asaduddin Owaisi. Siraj was named Player of the Match. Shubman Gill captained the team after Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's retirements. Gill also received the Player of the Series award.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/mohammed-sirajs-classy-reply-to-asaduddin-owaisis-viral-poora-khol-comment/articleshow/123144513.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/mohammed-sirajs-classy-reply-to-asaduddin-owaisis-viral-poora-khol-comment/articleshow/123144513.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 19:45:05 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="58152" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123144506,imgsize-58152.cms"/></item><item><title>Russia-Ukraine war: Trump hints at shifting peace deal deadline; aide holds 'productive' talks</title><description><![CDATA[US envoy Steve Witkoff met with Vladimir Putin at the Kremlin for three hours amidst efforts to end the Ukraine war. This meeting occurred before a deadline for Russia to agree to peace or face new sanctions. Donald Trump hinted at diplomatic progress, stating the meeting was "highly productive.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-russia-diplomacy-trumps-envoy-meets-putin-for-3-hour-productive-talk-sanctions-still-on-table/articleshow/123147636.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-russia-diplomacy-trumps-envoy-meets-putin-for-3-hour-productive-talk-sanctions-still-on-table/articleshow/123147636.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 23:18:19 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="781689" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123148062,imgsize-781689.cms"/></item><item><title>'Attempt to blackmail India': Rahul on Trump's extra 25% tariff; targets PM</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi criticized US President Trump's increased tariffs on India as "economic blackmail" to force an unfair trade deal. He alleged PM Modi's silence on the issue stems from a US investigation into Adani and potential exposure of financial links. India defended its right to pursue energy policies based on national interest amidst the tariff threats.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/attempt-to-blackmail-india-rahul-gandhi-on-trumps-extra-25-tariff-targets-pm-modi/articleshow/123145538.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/attempt-to-blackmail-india-rahul-gandhi-on-trumps-extra-25-tariff-targets-pm-modi/articleshow/123145538.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 21:01:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="26686" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123145664,imgsize-26686.cms"/></item><item><title>Brazil Protests 50% Tariffs at WTO; Lula Plans Talks with Modi, Xi</title><description><![CDATA[Brazil has approached the World Trade Organization regarding US tariffs. These tariffs impact a significant portion of Brazilian exports. President Lula intends to discuss the matter with Prime Minister Narendra Modi and President Xi Jinping. The US has also sanctioned a Brazilian Supreme Court Justice. This action is related to the trial of former President Jair Bolsonaro.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/brazil-moves-wto-in-protest-over-50-tariffs-lula-rules-out-call-with-trump-plans-talks-with-pm-modi-xi/articleshow/123146598.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/brazil-moves-wto-in-protest-over-50-tariffs-lula-rules-out-call-with-trump-plans-talks-with-pm-modi-xi/articleshow/123146598.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 22:50:39 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1194862" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123147441,imgsize-1194862.cms"/></item><item><title>'India enabling Putin's butchery': Ex-UK PM Johnson backs Trump's additional tariff; lauds US president</title><description><![CDATA[Boris Johnson has endorsed Donald Trump's decision to impose an additional 25% tariff on India, asserting it's a justified response to New Delhi's support for Vladimir Putin amidst the Ukraine conflict. Johnson criticized European nations, including Britain, for their reluctance to penalize countries funding Russia's war efforts.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/made-india-pay-for-putins-butchery-ex-uk-pm-boris-johnson-backs-trumps-additional-tariff-lauds-us-president-for-brave-move/articleshow/123147410.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/international-business/made-india-pay-for-putins-butchery-ex-uk-pm-boris-johnson-backs-trumps-additional-tariff-lauds-us-president-for-brave-move/articleshow/123147410.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 23:08:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19846" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123147749,imgsize-19846.cms"/></item><item><title>Big revelation! 'It was Gautam Gambhir who insisted on this transition'</title><description><![CDATA[Navjot Singh Sidhu lauded Gautam Gambhir for his conviction and support of emerging talent during India's Test series in England, despite facing criticism. Sidhu highlighted Gambhir's role in providing opportunities to players like Akash Deep and Washington, emphasizing the team's spirited performance and commendable draw achieved despite missing key players like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/big-revelation-it-was-gautam-gambhir-who-insisted-on-this-transition-says-ex-india-cricketer/articleshow/123146612.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/big-revelation-it-was-gautam-gambhir-who-insisted-on-this-transition-says-ex-india-cricketer/articleshow/123146612.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 22:21:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="77504" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123146658,imgsize-77504.cms"/></item><item><title>US army base in lockdown: 5 soldiers shot at in Georgia; shooter apprehended</title><description><![CDATA[A shooting at Fort Stewart-Hunter Army Airfield in Georgia left five soldiers injured, prompting a base-wide lockdown. The gunman is in custody, and authorities have confirmed there is no further threat.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-active-shooter-confirmed-at-fort-stewart-army-base-parts-of-georgia-installation-on-lockdown-soldiers-told-to-shelter/articleshow/123146065.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/us-active-shooter-confirmed-at-fort-stewart-army-base-parts-of-georgia-installation-on-lockdown-soldiers-told-to-shelter/articleshow/123146065.cms</guid><pubDate>Wed, 06 Aug 2025 21:34:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="237968" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123146125,imgsize-237968.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <description><![CDATA[The Surrey Coroner’s Office has been approached for details, even as a coroner's report from the office of Kapur’s wife – Priya Sachdev Kapur – has been referenced across Indian media reports, giving the industrialist’s cause of death as the result of “left ventricular hypertrophy and ischemic heart disease”.       <description><![CDATA[ICICI Bank has topped the charts among large private sector lenders in the first quarter earnings, with strong loan growth, stable margins, and healthy asset quality.       <description><![CDATA[Rare earth element (REE) reserves have been identified in Madhya Pradesh’s Singrauli coalfields, Parliament was told. Coal India is conducting R&D for REE extraction.       <title><![CDATA[Genius Act gives legitimacy boost to stablecoins, says Cornell’s Eswar Prasad]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/cryptocurrency/genius-act-stablecoins-legalisation-cryptocurrencies-eswar-prasad-19644875.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The Genius Act marks a turning point for stablecoins, offering them legal legitimacy and regulatory clarity. “This legitimisation of stablecoins is certainly going to give a huge boost,” says Eswar Prasad, Professor at Cornell University. With major players like Tether and USD Coin already surpassing $200 billion in market cap, the Act is expected to accelerate adoption and open doors for private issuers like Amazon and Walmart.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>
